rows.label: qev090801_MSG0006
rows.name: H.B.! Pulala looking for friend named H.B.![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0007
rows.name: And I've been looking for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0008
rows.name:
I spoke to Eleonora.
I take it you're the Nopon who has been asking after me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0009
rows.name: Huh? Glasses friend is H.B.?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0010
rows.name:
Ah, the scope of my fame is terrifying.
My name has become a chorus across races![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0011
rows.name: Friends of Pulala always talk about amazing man with 200 IQ.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0012
rows.name:
And Prone speak of combat skills. Say you fight anything.
That no creature is too fierce.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0013_m
rows.name: Yes, all true, I'm afraid. My partner here will attest to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0013_f
rows.name: Yes, all true, I'm afraid. My partner here will attest to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev090801_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that it's all true and more.

rows.label: qev090801_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev090801_SEL0041
rows.name: Laugh at their absurd claims.

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0014
rows.name:
Admirable. A lesser BLADE would be blinded with envy,
and yet you remain a beacon of truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0015
rows.name:
Jealousy is an ugly thing.
You really must learn to control it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0016
rows.name:
Now, what was it you needed?
I'll do anything within my powerâ€”which is anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0017
rows.name: That worked just like Eleonora say![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0018
rows.name:
Butter up glasses man with random flatterings,
and he do any job Pulala want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0019
rows.name:
Quiet, fool! Earth alien is falling for it.
Do not be so honest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0020
rows.name: Hmm, what's this about honesty?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0021
rows.name: Just another fine trait of friend H.B.![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0022
rows.name:
Pulala and tentacle friend have job
only amazing man like H.B. can do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0023
rows.name: Recently, terrible Prone people are hurting poor Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0024
rows.name:
It is Blood-king Gelvo Banth.
Even among Cavern Clan, his brutality is known.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0025
rows.name: The name says it all, I suspect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0026
rows.name:
Few days ago, bloody king attack caravan
on trade route and roast everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0027
rows.name:
If friends do not help,
Nopon everywhere become lunch![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0028
rows.name:
Despicable... This barbarian must be
brought to heel as soon as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0029
rows.name:
But bloody king is clever.
No one knows where his super-secret base is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0030
rows.name:
Hiding in shadows... Tormenting the weak...
Typical Cavern scum behavior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0031
rows.name:
Pulala heard Pathfinder friends good at gathering info,
came to seek help finding bloody king![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0032
rows.name:
Well, we ARE the eyes and ears of BLADE.
All of Mira is our backyard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0033
rows.name: I'll have a look on FrontierNav straightaway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0034
rows.name: Hmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0035
rows.name: Right. I'd say we found our base.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0036
rows.name: Amazing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0036_2
rows.name: My clansmen looked everywhere... Found nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0037
rows.name: What magic is this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0038
rows.name:
Just the magic of hard work and
diligent data-probe installation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0039
rows.name:
All the answers are just a click away.
But for now, I have a despot to topple![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0040
rows.name: Friends do that for Pulala?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0041
rows.name: Pulala heard fighting was Harrier job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0042
rows.name:
I don't trust anyone else to finish what I've started.
I'll see it through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0043_m
rows.name:
Well, I and my new assistant here.
Isn't that right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0043_f
rows.name:
Well, I and my new assistant here.
Isn't that right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_JNK0050
rows.name: Wonder

rows.label: qev090801_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask H.B. if he's really going to steal a Harrier job.

rows.label: qev090801_JNK0060
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev090801_SEL0061
rows.name: Nod grimly and prepare for battle.

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0044
rows.name:
I've often told Commander Vandham that his system
of segregated divisions is obsolete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0045
rows.name: Those with ability should be free to exercise it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0046
rows.name:
And now I shall prove just that
by eliminating this blood-king character.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0047
rows.name: I'm glad I asked you for help in this matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0048
rows.name:
Some BLADEs cling to that obsolete system
of segregated divisions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0049
rows.name: It does my heart good to see that you are not one of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0050
rows.name:
Bringing this blood-king to justice
will be yet more proof that I am correct on this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0051
rows.name: Hmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0052
rows.name: No, I'm not seeing any likely Prone activity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0053
rows.name: It seems we don't have enough active data probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0054
rows.name: Is something wrong? Did friend not find Gelvo Banth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0055
rows.name:
No cause for concern.
Wait here for a moment while I consult Eleonora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090801_MSG0056
rows.name:
Come. I'm sure she'll have some sort
of pertinent information I can use.[ST:wait ]
